andromeda.why: Refuses fear-based control; chooses whether to engage the trial at all.

arcturus.why: Calibrates risk—scope, safety, and baseline before entering the game.

draco.why: Status-bravado: taking risks to dominate rather than to learn.

lyra.why: Focus is survival calculus, not aesthetic display.

orion-dark.why: Using danger as obedience theater: ‘prove yourself now.’

orion-light.why: Honorable trial begins privately—test the edge with discipline.

pleiades.why: Gentle self-attunement steadies early encounters with fear.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching struggle hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Won’t be coerced into someone else’s ‘necessary’ risk.

arcturus.why: Right-sizing the challenge—choose battles that a container can hold.

draco.why: Loyalty tests and rank games around who ‘dares enough.’

lyra.why: This is sober selection, not style.

orion-light.why: Discipline of picking the meaningful ordeal, not every ordeal.

pleiades.why: Reads the room/body so the risk is humanly receivable.

sirius.why: Personal discernment phase; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Pushes back after coercive or meaningless trials; reclaims choice.

arcturus.why: Risk regulation wobbles—reckless then over-cautious while learning limits.

orion-dark.why: Doctrinal ‘rites’ weaponized to break will rather than forge it.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction: admit misreads, reset, re-engage cleanly.

pleiades.why: Appeasement risks—saying yes to belong, not because it’s true.

sirius.why: Self-forging through trial-and-error; no law transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Protects sovereignty by defining fair trials vs. abusive tests.

arcturus.why: Turns risk into curriculum—standards, safeties, progressions.

draco.why: Gatekeeping who is ‘worthy’ of the challenge.

lyra.why: Inspiring model—courage presented with clean form.

orion-dark.why: Orthodoxy around ‘the one right way’ to face danger.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-trial: others face the ordeal in a pattern that builds them.

pleiades.why: Humane pacing keeps courage from sliding into harm.

sirius.why: Ordeal protocol—teaches right struggle through clear initiatory frames.

andromeda.why: Refuses propaganda of ‘heroic sacrifice’ when it serves domination.

arcturus.why: Projected as the fixer/hero → scapegoated when refusing bad risks.

draco.why: Rank tests around who will ‘risk enough’ to please the gatekeepers.

lyra.why: Composed courage—visible, steady example without theatrics.

orion-dark.why: Doctrinal valor used to compel obedience and spectacle.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—choose meaningful risks, not applause risks.

pleiades.why: Appeasing the crowd with unsafe concessions.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: models ethical courage despite pressure.

andromeda.why: Embodied defender—frees others from coercive or meaningless ordeals.

arcturus.why: Elder risk architecture—durable standards for training, hazard, recovery.

draco.why: Legacy rank can harden into access control over ‘real’ challenges.

lyra.why: Stoic elegance—courage with restraint becomes cultural signal.

orion-dark.why: Canonizing risk as hierarchy rather than service to meaning.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—courage without bravado; fights only for what gives life meaning.

pleiades.why: Focus is standards of ordeal and meaning, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Ordeal sage—teaches the law of meaningful struggle and right risk by embodied example.
